Posts.Content: bugs512 wrote: I start chemo on the oct 11 and have been doing research on the Penguin Cold Caps. Has anyone used them recently and can tell me how it worked for them? I'm 27 and have been diagnosed with stage 2 breast cancer. I have long beautiful hair and I am devastated that I'm going to lose it! Help guide me in the right direction! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Cold Caps Help! bugs512 BanR
